name: Classic Inca Trail To Machu Picchu, 4 Days.
description: Let us lead you on the Inca Trail, a wonderful stone-paved path (about 70% of the journey) toward the ancient Inca City of Machu Picchu, passing through a few more archaeological sites along the trail and several beautiful ravines. This is going to be a challenge for you, but certainly not impossible! After finishing the entire journey, you will feel the satisfaction of having accomplished rigorous exercise and a fantastic adventure.
